query: SELECT id, name, slug, overview, topThingsToDo, attractions, published FROM island_guides WHERE name IN ('Himmafushi', 'Omadhoo', 'Feridhoo', 'Dhangethi', 'Mathiveri', 'Gulhi', 'Goidhoo', 'Fulhadhoo', 'Fehendhoo', 'Hanimadhoo', 'Fuvahmulah') ORDER BY name
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT id, name, slug, overview, topThingsToDo, attractions, published FROM island_guides WHERE name IN ('Himmafushi', 'Omadhoo', 'Feridhoo', 'Dhangethi', 'Mathiveri', 'Gulhi', 'Goidhoo', 'Fulhadhoo', 'Fehendhoo', 'Hanimadhoo', 'Fuvahmulah') ORDER BY name

rows.name: Dhangethi
rows.overview: Water sports and diving paradise with multiple dive sites and excellent reef access

rows.name: Fehendhoo
rows.overview: Local island in the Lhaviyani Atoll region with authentic island experience

rows.name: Feridhoo
rows.overview: Remote island with beautiful reef featuring 80% live corals and pristine diving conditions

rows.name: Feridhoo
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"name":"Snorkeling at Feridhoo House Reef","description":"Discover the vibrant underwater world just steps from the shore, teeming with colorful fish and healthy coral formations.","category":"snorkeling","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Dolphin Watching Sunset Cruise","description":"Embark on a traditional Maldivian Dhoni boat to witness playful pods of dolphins leap and twirl against a breathtaking sunset backdrop.","category":"nature","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Local Island Walking Tour","description":"Stroll through the charming streets of Feridhoo, observe daily island life, visit the local mosque, and interact with friendly residents.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Sandbank Picnic Excursion","description":"Enjoy a secluded picnic lunch on a pristine, uninhabited sandbank, surrounded by crystal-clear turquoise waters.","category":"relaxation","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Night Fishing Experience","description":"Join local fishermen on a traditional fishing trip under the stars, learning Maldivian handline techniques and hopefully catching your dinner.","category":"adventure","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Scuba Diving near Feridhoo Thila","description":"Explore renowned dive sites like Feridhoo Thila, known for its diverse marine life, including sharks, rays, and pelagic species.","category":"diving","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Kayaking or Paddleboarding","description":"Rent a kayak or stand-up paddleboard to gently explore the calm, shallow lagoons surrounding Feridhoo island at your own pace.","category":"water-sports","difficulty":"easy"}]

rows.name: Fulhadhoo
rows.overview: Remote island in Baa Atoll with pristine reefs and limited tourist infrastructure

rows.name: Fuvahmulah
rows.overview: Southernmost island famous for tiger shark diving and unique geological features

rows.name: Goidhoo
rows.overview: Peaceful local island with access to Hanifaru Bay and excellent diving opportunities

rows.name: Gulhi
rows.overview: Local island with authentic Maldivian culture and excellent house reef for snorkeling

rows.name: Hanimadhoo
rows.overview: Northernmost local island with unique geography and excellent diving conditions

rows.name: Himmafushi
rows.overview: Surfing hotspot with two daily speedboat services and excellent wave breaks for all levels

rows.name: Mathiveri
rows.overview: Small intimate island with one tourist beach and nearby uninhabited islands for exploration

rows.name: Mathiveri
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"name":"Snorkeling at Mathiveri House Reef","description":"Discover the vibrant underwater world just steps from the shore, teeming with colorful fish and healthy corals.","category":"snorkeling","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Sandbank Excursion","description":"Enjoy a private escape to a pristine, uninhabited sandbank for sunbathing, swimming, and breathtaking photo opportunities.","category":"nature","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Dolphin Cruise","description":"Embark on a sunset boat trip to witness playful pods of dolphins leaping and swimming in their natural habitat.","category":"nature","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Local Island Cultural Walk","description":"Explore the local village, interact with residents, and learn about the Maldivian way of life, including traditional crafts and architecture.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Night Fishing Trip","description":"Experience traditional Maldivian hand-line fishing under the stars, with your catch potentially being cooked for dinner.","category":"adventure","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Scuba Diving at Nearby Dive Sites","description":"Explore incredible dive sites around Mathiveri, encountering reef sharks, manta rays, and diverse marine life in crystal-clear waters.","category":"diving","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Kayaking or Stand-Up Paddleboarding","description":"Paddle across the calm, turquoise lagoon, enjoying the serene beauty of Mathiveri from a unique perspective.","category":"water-sports","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Beachfront BBQ Dinner","description":"Savor a delicious fresh seafood BBQ dinner right on the beach, often accompanied by the sound of the waves and a stunning sunset.","category":"food","difficulty":"easy"}]

rows.name: Omadhoo
rows.overview: Underrated gem with excellent tourist beach, long house reef, and affordable accommodations
